comment.author: 27817825@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/jeromeg111] Do you mean "The Right Stuff" could have been an accurate account?  He could have just been in the bathroom when they did the signing. Maybe it was a Marine taboo against singing group photos.
